alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Carlton; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 11:00PM CDT until June 20 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN AITKIN...NORTHWESTERN PINE AND CARLTON COUNTIES... At 1100 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tamarack, to 7 miles east of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, to 9 miles northeast of McGrath, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kettle River, Moose Lake, Cromwell, Barnum, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Mahtowa, Nemadji, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area and Cloquet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
